The Earth is entering an ascension cycle acceleration period, its grid will be infused with UHF D-5 through D-9 energies via a process of Stellar Acti- vations. The Stellar Activations will occur as Earth's Merkaba Fields align directly with the Merkaba Fields of six Stellar Spirals, as parts of Earth's natu- ra l procession through its 26,556-year Euiago time cycle . Everyone on the planet will begin to have cellular activations directly through the Earth’ s grid, due to the coming Stellar Spiral alignments and the planetary Stellar Activations these alignments will create.
